name: The Dancer
description:
Run away from the most terrifying thing known to man: royalty free music

Originally made as a joke, experience the dancer in its full, terrifying glory.

You've entered an 'abandoned' asylum for a dare, but you end up hearing more than you bargained for. Find 3 keys and escape before it's too late! This game was originally going to be released on april fool's day, but it got... delayed. 

Have fun! - spacepiano ;)
